abstract: Ryan Seacrest has signed a new deal with Comcast Entertainment Group to keep the “American Idol” host on E! through 2012.
snippet: Ryan Seacrest has signed a new deal with Comcast Entertainment Group to keep the “American Idol” host on E! through 2012.
lead_paragraph: Ryan Seacrest has signed a new deal with Comcast Entertainment Group to keep the “American Idol” host on E! through 2012.

headline.main: Seacrest Signs New Deal With Comcast

abstract: After regulators ordered Comcast to devise a new method for managing its traffic, the company said it would reduce top speeds for the heaviest users for 10 to 20 minutes.
snippet: After regulators ordered Comcast to devise a new method for managing its traffic, the company said it would reduce top speeds for the heaviest users for 10 to 20 minutes.
lead_paragraph: The Comcast Corporation plans to slow service to its heaviest Internet users during periods of congestion after regulators ordered the company to devise a new method for managing its Web traffic.

headline.main: Comcast to Slow Internet Service at Times to Its Heaviest Users
headline.print_headline: Comcast to Slow Web Service At Times to Its Heaviest Users
